quoteText:
We may also disclose your personal information

  • in response to lawful requests by public authorities, including to meet national security or law enforcement requirements.
  • as required by law such as to comply with a subpoena, or similar legal process.
  • when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request.
title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
